title: Can we pls limit DQ
body: I think many solo players ( just like me ) would be interested for limiting DQ. Just to make it quick, pls make the party size to 3. We got Teamranked back so why should we still use DQ for a whole team. Pls do it riot, most of the guys here would be proud of you. PS: Soory im not good at grammar, german guy over here :P

replies.body: 5s play against 5s.  Only issue is for the poor solo queuers stuck in a team of 4.

They have Team ranked back so why don't queue up for that. Much boosting would be gone aswell. It wont get away entirely but that could be a good start. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Edit: The system could improve whit that.
